Hi Varun,

Its possible that the schedulerDispatcher.lastSchedulerEvent is null if its not been set yet. Check for not null as well in the while loop would be good in that case. 
It would be nicer to reduce the sleep to 100 instead of 1000.

This message was automatically generated.
LGTM. Tried out the changes and even if I force slow down the scheduler dispatcher thread to simulate a slow machine it still passes.
Thanks [~adhoot] for reviewing. Found out the root cause which is causing other test failures as well. Raised YARN-3916 for it.
